name: gold-plated filigree smoky quartz earrings
description:
Oval filigrees, carefully gold-plated and hammered firmly for that textured look, have faceted semi-precious stones of smoky quartz dangling from their bottom curves. Like earrings for a dignified Greek goddess, they are wonderful with that dress you have been meaning to wear!

L 9cm W 2.7cm • Gold-plated ear wires

*Ear wires can be changed to ear hooks according to your preference. Ear wires hang longer. Ear hooks will be shorter by 0.8 - 1cm.

name: let there be flowers necklace
description:
Suddenly struck by what the world would be like if there are no flowers, I made this necklace to mimick how dreary and dark our Earth would get if not for these pretty little things that give simple joy.

These noir lace flowers are individually hand sewn together to form a unique shape that drapes beautifully on your collarbones like an intricate collar. Hanging in the centre, a semi-precious smoky quartz lands nicely on your chestbone. Best worn against bare skin or a single color (not black though) dress or blouse.

L 27cm W 13cm • Adjustable length • Copper link chain

name: soaring over emerald seas earrings
description:
Two golden birds fly over seas of emerald greens in this pair of dainty earrings. Hanging from ear wire, a little bird is perched over Czech fire-polished emerald glass beads which gleams softly against the light, right above your jawline.

L 4cm • Gold color ear wires

categories.name: Earth Goddess | Trees, Elephants, Doves, Flowers

name: flying over snowy fields earrings
description:
Two silvery birds fly over snowy fields in this pair of dainty earrings. Hanging from ear wire, a little bird is perched over a Swarovski clear diamond crystal which resembles an icy ridge, and gleams softly against the light, slightly below your jawline.

L 5cm • Silver color ear wires

categories.name: Earth Goddess | Trees, Elephants, Doves, Flowers

name: doving over clear quartz earrings
description:
Matt gold doves. surrounded by a pair of matt silver teardrop halos, dangles over two drops of semi-precious clear quartz, organically wrapped with silver satin wire. These earrings add dramatic sheen to your face and ears as they sway stylishly near your shoulders.

L 8.6cm • Matt silver teardrop frame H 4cm W 2.5cm • Clear quartz W 1.5cm H 2cm • Ear hooks
